snippet: That sitting legislators are being challenged by fellow Republicans shows that much of the state’s real political action happens not in general elections, but in Republican primaries.
lead_paragraph: That sitting legislators are being challenged by fellow Republicans shows that much of the state’s real political action happens not in general elections, but in Republican primaries.

headline.main: Tussle in G.O.P. As Challengers Eye Primaries
headline.print_headline: Tussle in G.O.P. As Challengers Eye Primaries
